attributes.action: Remove TV license charges for individual students living in halls of residence
attributes.additional_details:
Students are having it increasingly bad in the UK with the tuition fees, cuts to maintenance grants and increasing living costs. So as to charge students for a TV license individually is preposterous and an unnecessary expense on the average students already tight budget. Such solutions are:
(a)- spread the charges across an individual flat or the block of accommodation, or
(b)- remove TV licenses completely because they are archaic, and instead run advertisements on BBC programmes.
attributes.background: This petition aims to remove individual TV license charges for university students living in halls of residence. An alternative would be to charge each individual flat or block a single charge which would be incorporated into the price of the annual accommodation.
